about_me.des: I am a software engineer with expertise in building enterprise applications for desktop, web, and mobile.

projects.cgspacetweets: A tool to mass-tweet CGSpace entries to twitter, also providing the status of each entry as being tweeted or not.
projects.dagris: An information system designed to facilitate the compilation, organization and dissemination of information on the origin, distribution, diversity, present use and status of indigenous farm animal genetic resources.
projects.datetimepicker: A Bootstrap 3 DateTime picker widget packaged for use with Meteor.js
projects.surveylizer: A survey data collection and analysis tool, made with Meteor!
projects.ride: A Bootstrap 3 DateTime picker widget packaged for use with Meteor.js
projects.surveylizer: A survey data collection and analysis tool, made with Meteor!
